name: common-markdown
description: A WebAssembly wrapper for pulldown-cmark, a (CommonMark) Markdown parser.

scripts.build: rm -rf pkg && wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-name common-markdown && echo "await init();" >> pkg/common-markdown.js
scripts.release: npm test && standard-version && git push --follow-tags && cd dist && npm publish

author: Fredrik Söderström <tirithen@gmail.com>
